backend/main.mo: Main backend actor defining access control, user profiles with a new showResidentProfileReport field, health checks, and resident-related data types.
backend/migration.mo: Migration that adds showResidentProfileReport=true to all existing user profiles when upgrading.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping backend and frontend files to two profile-report visibility features with test IDs and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file, including new UI behaviors tied to showResidentProfileReport.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v22-to-pro: Release documentation for promoting Draft Version 22 to production with no code changes and preserved canister state.
frontend/docs/release/promote-v27-to-pro: Release documentation for promoting Draft Version 27 to production, reusing existing build artifacts and preserving backend state.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global CSS defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML page loading the React app with favicon links and the root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up React Query, routing, authentication boot flow, backend actor initialization, and global app layout with loading and error handling.
frontend/src/components/adl/ADLTab.tsx: Displays a resident's ADL records in a table and allows adding new records when permitted.
frontend/src/components/adl/modals/AddAD: Modal form for creating a new ADL record and submitting it via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with a button to return to the dashboard.
frontend/src/components/auth/BootErrorSc: Displays detailed boot-time errors with retry, logout, and diagnostic copy options.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time users to create and save their profile and role settings.
frontend/src/components/branding/Logo.ts: Renders the Moritz Care Home logo in different size variants.
Provides the main app layout with header, auth controls, navigation, and footer.
frontend/src/components/mar/MARTab.tsx: Displays MAR records for a resident and allows adding new records via modal if permitted.
frontend/src/components/mar/modals/AddMA: Form modal for creating a new MAR record with medication selection and required fields.
frontend/src/components/medications/admi: Defines standard administration routes and a helper to include custom route values.
frontend/src/components/medications/Medi: Renders active and discontinued medication sections with edit, discontinue, and reactivate actions.
Shows a resident’s medications with options to add, edit, or discontinue when allowed.
frontend/src/components/medications/moda: Modal for adding a medication with dosage, route, times, physician, and PRN options.
Modal for editing an existing medication’s details including route, times, physician, and PRN state.
frontend/src/components/residents/CodeSt: Renders a badge showing a resident's code status, styling differently for DNR vs Full Code.
frontend/src/components/residents/modals: Provides a form modal to create a new resident with fields for personal info, physicians, contacts, medications, and insurance.
Modal for editing existing resident details, including basic info, physicians, and pharmacy data.
frontend/src/components/residents/Reside: Generates a printable resident profile report including demographics, physicians, medications, and code status.
frontend/src/components/vitals/DailyVita: Displays a resident's recorded daily vitals in a table and allows adding new entries if permitted.
frontend/src/components/vitals/modals/Re: Form modal for entering new daily vital sign measurements and submitting them to the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor, refreshing it when identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling identity loading, login, logout, and status tracking. Wraps AuthClient setup with custom options and exposes identity state to consumers.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, residents, and related data through an authenticated actor. Includes admin checks, access filtering, retries, and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useResilientActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor that retries on failure and invalidates dependent queries when ready. Supports forced retries and optional admin initialization via URL token.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and theme variables, enforces solid backgrounds for UI components, and defines print styles. Includes light/dark mode palettes using OKLCH colors.
frontend/src/lib/auth/helpers.ts: Contains helper functions for authorization checks such as determining staff/admin privileges and resident access. Also maps user types to readable labels.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app by mounting it with React Query and Internet Identity providers. Imports global styles and renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentDashboardPage: Implements the resident dashboard page with filtering, sorting, and stats display, using multiple data-fetching hooks. Includes UI for adding residents and navigating to resident details.
frontend/src/pages/ResidentProfilePage.t: Displays a resident’s profile with tabs, actions, and modals, conditionally showing the profile report and edit features based on user permissions and settings.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides a settings UI allowing users to toggle whether the Resident Profile Report is shown, saving the preference to the user profile.
frontend/src/utils/dateOnly.ts: Implements date-only parsing and age calculation utilities without timezone effects, plus simple age formatting.
frontend/src/utils/errorDiagnostics.ts: Normalizes unknown errors into structured diagnostic data and formats them for display or logging.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning hash parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins used throughout the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, and feature request tracking for the Resident Profile Report visibility toggle.
